content: PF Tourism Taxi Services provides airport pickup and drop, local city rides, and sightseeing taxi packages.
PF Tourism Taxi Services currently operates in Mumbai, Pune, and Nashik.
Customers can pre-book rides for airport transfers, intercity travel, and hourly local use.
For local sightseeing, PF Tourism offers customizable itineraries based on the customer's schedule.
Service support includes driver assignment updates and trip status coordination before pickup.
Pricing and final availability depend on city, vehicle type, travel date, and total trip distance.
